remarks: The difference of two infinite series.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
sersub.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
sersub.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
sersub.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) $.
sersub.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) - ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
sersub $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( + , H ) ` N ) = ( ( seq M ( + , F ) ` N ) - ( seq M ( + , G ) ` N ) ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d H k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
